4829.verse: وَأَنَّهُۥ|And that He|100|125|7215$خَلَقَ|created|71|122|299$ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ|the pairs,|106|156|16300$ٱلذَّكَرَ|the male|77|128|16301$وَٱلْأُنثَىٰ|and the female|119|144|1547$

4836.verse: وَقَوْمَ|And (the) people|132|144|12771$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh|75|99|4641$مِّن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before.|92|116|250$إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, they|105|129|106$كَانُواْ هُمْ|they were|103|127|16306$أَظْلَمَ|more unjust|98|110|177$وَأَطْغَىٰ|and more rebellious.|152|152|16307$

4839.verse: فَبِأَىِّ|Then which (of)|126|163|7041$ءَالَآءِ|the Favors|91|165|16312$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord,|117|191|1322$تَتَمَارَىٰ|will you doubt?|119|156|16313$

4847.verse: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ|Has come near|118|166|16324$ٱلسَّاعَةُ|the Hour|87|183|5525$وَٱنشَقَّ|and has split|104|200|16325$ٱلْقَمَرُ|the moon.|87|135|16326$

4849.verse: وَكَذَّبُواْ|And they denied|128|154|407$وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ|and followed|103|154|945$أَهْوَآءَهُمْ‌ۚ|their desires,|106|157|1116$وَكُلُّ|but (for) every|119|170|9354$أَمْرٍ|matter|64|90|5045$مُّسْتَقِرٌّ|(will be a) settlement.|167|167|16330$

4850.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|114|640$جَآءَهُم|has come to them|140|153|853$مِّنَ|of|50|63|156$ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ|the information|120|133|16331$مَا فِيهِ|wherein|78|91|16332$مُزْدَجَرٌ|(is) deterrence,|124|131|16333$

4829.verse: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

4830.verse: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

4831.verse: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

4832.verse: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

4833.verse: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

4834.verse: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

4835.verse: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

4836.verse: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

4837.verse: And the overturned towns He hurled down

4838.verse: And covered them by that which He covered.

4839.verse: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

4840.verse: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

4842.verse: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

4843.verse: Then at this statement do you wonder?

4844.verse: And you laugh and do not weep

4846.verse: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

4847.verse: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

4848.verse: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

4849.verse: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

4850.verse: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -

4851.verse: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

4852.verse: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
